definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1
quan2 shen1 zhong1 du2 xing4 du2 ji4

definition: wholeheartedly/(to devote oneself) heart and soul
to escape unscathed/to get through in one piece

sentences.english: Yuan Longping devoted himself to his work.
sentences.chinese: 袁隆平全身心投入到工作中。

sentences.english: His senses dulled as the drug swept through his body.
sentences.chinese: 当毒素传遍他全身时，他的感觉变得麻木了。

sentences.english: Your reflexes are all demanding that you bite.
sentences.chinese: 你全身的神经反应都在要求你准备大开杀戒。

sentences.english: A full-body CT scan gives a radiation dose of 20-30 millisieverts.
sentences.chinese: 一次全身CT扫描的辐射剂量是20～30毫希弗。

sentences.english: Symptoms of anaemia include general fatigue and lassitude.
sentences.chinese: 贫血症状包括全身疲劳和困乏。

sentences.english: These composition can achieve the whole body circularly through blood each place.
sentences.chinese: 这些成分可以通过血液循环达到全身各部位。

sentences.english: The child presented with generalised redness of the skin and itching all over his body.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子表现为全身皮肤发红和瘙痒。

sentences.english: She covered her mouth with her hand, another wave of chills flowing over her as her knees literally knocked together.
sentences.chinese: 她用手捂住嘴，又一阵恶寒让她全身发抖，膝盖打颤。

sentences.english: She was all cold and bedraggled after falling into the river.
sentences.chinese: 她跌落河中后把全身弄得又湿又脏又冷。

sentences.english: But while he wondered, he shot in a straight left, the weight of his body behind the blow.
sentences.chinese: 可同时左手又挥出了一个直拳，全身力气都压了上去。

sentences.english: If the whole body were an eye, where were the hearing?
sentences.chinese: 若全身是眼，从那里听声呢。

sentences.english: Plate armour is called a "harness", and it requires a Master Armourer to make and fit it to a soldier.
sentences.chinese: 板甲又名全身甲，需要盔甲大师为士兵度身定造。

sentences.english: What about going to the hospital and having a general check-up?
sentences.chinese: 妻医院去全身检查一下怎么样？

sentences.english: Early seedling, feel a burst of hair of whole body hot.
sentences.chinese: 早苗，就感到全身一阵发烫。

sentences.english: This energy is something like positive and negative electrical charges pulsating throughout.
sentences.chinese: 这种能量就像正负电荷一样脉动着流遍全身。

sentences.english: Different strides of different personalities captured in full-body shots while strolling in Orchard Road.
sentences.chinese: 不同性格不同的进展捕获全身镜头，而在乌节路散步。

definition: the four limbs of the body
surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
